data.actual_result: Top border decreases by a few pixels.
data.short_description: Top border of text field goes down a few pixels when x amount of characters are typed (depends on window width)
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your window width to roughly 1400 (+-) - Set zoom to 110, (possibly text size to 100) - Hold down a key (lowercase L seems to be the least "spammy") until the top border goes down a few pixels
